data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Smartworks Coworking Spaces Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from July 17 2025 the equity shares of Smartworks Coworking Spaces Ltd  (Scrip Code: 544447) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250716- dated July 16 2025.
